recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Boil water and cook the spaghetti for 10 minutes until al dente.
In a pan, cook the ground beef until browned and cooked through.
Add the tomato sauce to the beef and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve the spaghetti with the beef sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice it.
Toss the romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add the grilled chicken and croutons to the salad.
Serve immediately with optional Parmesan cheese topping.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Stir-fry the tofu until golden brown, then remove and set aside.
In the same pan, stir-fry the broccoli and bell peppers until tender.
Add the tofu back to the pan, and pour the soy sauce over the vegetables.
Stir everything together and serve hot.

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Cook the rice and set aside to cool.
Whisk the eggs and cook them in a pan until scrambled.
Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir in the eggs.
Add green onions and soy sauce. Stir-fry until everything is mixed together and heated through.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
steps: Cook the chicken thighs until browned.
Add curry powder and stir for a minute before adding the coconut milk.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the curry with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
steps: Brown the ground beef and add taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with beef, shredded lettuce, and cheese.
Serve with salsa or guacamole if desired.

recipes.name: Salmon with Asparagus
steps: Grill the salmon fillet with olive oil and season.
Roast the asparagus with olive oil in the oven until tender.
Serve the salmon on a plate with the roasted asparagus.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
steps: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked.
Toast the whole wheat bread slices.
Spread mayonnaise on both slices of bread.
Assemble the sandwich with grilled chicken, lettuce, tomato, and the bread.

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
steps: Dice the carrots, potatoes, onion, and tomato.
In a pot, heat the vegetable broth and add the diced vegetables.
Simmer for 20-30 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Pasta Primavera
steps: Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté the zucchini and bell pepper until soft.
Add the cooked pasta to the pan and toss everything together.
Serve with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook the linguine according to package directions.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add the shrimp and cook until pink, then add the lemon juice.
Toss the shrimp with the cooked linguine and serve hot.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
steps: Cook the quinoa as per the instructions on the package.
Dice the cucumber and crumble the feta cheese.
In a bowl, combine the quinoa, cucumber, feta, olive oil, and lemon juice.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Heat the olive oil in a pan and add minced garlic.
Add diced chicken breast and cook until golden brown.
Add sliced bell peppers and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and stir well. Cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place salmon fillet on a baking tray, drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Add minced garlic on top of the salmon.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, until salmon is cooked through.
Serve with steamed vegetables or a side salad.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Chili
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté diced onion until translucent.
Add kidney beans, diced tomatoes, and spices (such as cumin and chili powder).
Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream or some shredded cheese on top.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté the chopped onions and garlic.
Add carrots and lentils, then stir for 2 minutes.
Add water (or vegetable broth) and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, until lentils are tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and any additional spices, and serve warm.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Fries
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Cut sweet potatoes into fries and toss with olive oil, paprika, and garlic powder.
Place on a baking tray and bake for 25 minutes, flipping halfway through.
Serve warm with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Grilled Veggie Skewers
steps: Preheat the grill to medium heat.
Thread the vegetables onto skewers and brush with olive oil and lemon juice.
Grill for 4-5 minutes on each side, until vegetables are tender and slightly charred.
Serve with your favorite dipping sauce or alongside a grilled main course.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool.
Chop avocado and cherry tomatoes.
In a bowl, combine the quinoa, avocado, and tomatoes.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted water according to package instructions.
While the pasta is cooking, heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat and add sliced garlic.
Cook the garlic until golden brown, then add red chili flakes.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pan, tossing to coat in the garlic and oil.
Top with chopped parsley and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
steps: Press tofu to remove excess moisture, then cut into cubes.
Stir-fry tofu in a pan with sesame oil until golden brown on all sides.
Add broccoli and bell peppers to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Pour in the soy sauce and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Serve warm over steamed rice.

recipes.name: Mango Chicken Salad
steps: Cook chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice into strips.
In a bowl, mix the chicken, sliced mango, and mixed greens.
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice.
Toss gently and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella into rounds.
Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate, alternating them.
Top with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Soup
steps: In a pot, sauté chopped, onion, and garlic until fragrant.
Add diced pumpkin and cook for 5 minutes.
Add vegetable broth and simmer for 20 minutes, until pumpkin is tender.
Blend the soup until smooth, then stir in coconut milk.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve hot.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Lentil Curry
steps: Peel and cube the sweet potato, then cook in a pot with water until tender.
Rinse the lentils and add them to the pot with the sweet potatoes.
Add curry powder and coconut milk, and simmer until the lentils are soft.
Stir in spinach and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
In a hot pan, stir-fry the chicken until golden brown.
Add sliced bell peppers and stir-fry for another 5 minutes.
Pour in the soy sauce and stir to combine.
Serve over cooked rice.

recipes.name: Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop zucchini and cherry tomatoes.
In a pan, sauté zucchini until tender.
Mix cooked quinoa with sautéed zucchini, cherry tomatoes, and crumbled feta cheese.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Banana Oatmeal
steps: In a pot, combine rolled oats and almond milk; cook over medium heat until creamy.
Slice the banana and add it to the oats.
Drizzle with honey and stir to combine.
Serve warm, optionally topped with nuts or seeds.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos huge
steps: In a pan, cook the ground beef until browned.
Prepare taco shells according to package instructions.
Assemble tacos by adding cooked beef, lettuce, cheddar cheese, and salsa to each shell.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella cheese.
Layer tomatoes and mozzarella on a plate, alternating them.
Sprinkle with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
steps: Rinse the lentils and set aside.
In a large pot, combine lentils, chopped carrots, and celery.
Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add the egg and mix well.
Gradually add the flour and mix until combined.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Fruit Smoothie
steps: In a blender, combine banana, frozen berries, yogurt, and honey.
Blend until smooth.
Serve immediately in a glass.
